name: Heng Vicheka
title: Computer Science Student
summary: Frontend and design enthusiast with a passion for creating intuitive user experiences. Skilled in JavaScript, Node.js, and Express, with a strong foundation in web development principles. Eager to apply my skills in real-world projects and contribute to innovative solutions.

experience.description: Lead weekly sessions teaching C++ programming to club members. Developed curriculum and hands-on exercises to enhance students' understanding of programming concepts and problem-solving skills.

Created visually appealing graphics and promotional materials for club events and social media. Collaborated with club members to design engaging content that effectively communicated financial literacy topics to the student body.
